title: How do i uninstall the new client?
body:
I tried to updated my patch, but i guess i had to change my language setting into English (mine was in Korean), so i did and updated the patch + the new client. i tried to switch back English to Korean, but it wouldn't work when i tried to open the client. one of my friend said its because of that new client update. so i changed my language setting into English again and tried out the legacy client, shut the client, change the language into Korean, then tried to start it, it still wouldn't work. Then my friend said that i can uninstall that new client some how, but he doesnt know how to. 

Riot, how do i uninstall the new client? i really want to play my game in Korean. Things get messed up when i play it in English

replies.body: I believe that using language packs not currently supported by your region can cause issues with the updated client.  Your best bet would be to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)to restore your game files.  If you have any feedback feel free to let the client devs know over at the[ client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards.  Thanks for the report!
